links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: a(0)=343, a(n)=16807*a(n-1). -- From _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 10 2012
prog: (MAGMA) [7^(5*n+3): n in [0..15]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Jul 08 2011(Maxima) makelist(7^(5*n+3),n,0,20); [_Martin Ettl_, Oct 21 2012]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
